website_summaries.verdict: Inflate this bed in a matter of minutes with built-in pump. Firm yet comfortable mattress that stays firm and holds air well.
pros: Handy compartment stores away air pump cable
Quality material is comfortable with skid-free base to stop the bed from sliding
Easily portable, as it deflates down to 14.5 by 13.5 by 7.5 inches and a weight of 13.15 pounds
cons: Some users find that the material makes noise when moving or turning in the night

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Construction
customer_reviews.text: Bed sleeps very well Hardly any air loss over the first four days...when you do refill with air takes about 8-15 seconds with built in pump Now after sleeping on it a month..temporary till my move)..still great and minimal air loss over 4-5 days 5/2/19
customer_reviews.author: Barry Forman

customer_reviews.title: Good weight support, LOUD PUMP!
customer_reviews.text: Twin mattress says it supports up to 550 lbs, I am 350 lbs and have not had any issues. The air pump is fast to inflate and deflate but is rediculously loud with a high pitch and as someone on the autism spectrum with noise sensitivity this is horrible. But I don't know what else to do, I can't find many air mattresses that support my weight. Air pump also doesn't auto shut-off when air is inflated or deflated.
customer_reviews.author: AmbivalentMe

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an extra bed for our tall 4 year old grandson's visit. It went up very easily and stayed up without any additional air for a week. Twin mattress pad and sheets fit it well. It was also easy to deflate and pack away. we did not put it back in its box but the storage bag that came with it held the bed, the mattress pad and the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I am 300+ lbs. This air mattress was EXTREMELY comfortable and durable. Did not have to re-inflate at all over the course of 4 nights. Only wish is that is was about 6" wider. Inflated quickly with built in pump. Deflated just as quickly and was easy to fold and store in travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: S Williams

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE -- Popped after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this air bed. It developed a hole after just 3 months of use. Waste of money. I hope to contact manufacturer for a refund. I AM UPDATING THIS REVIEW TO FIVE STARS. THE COMPANY RESPONDED TO MY CONCERNS AND PROMPTLY PROVIDED A REPLACEMENT MATTRESS WHICH HAS BEEN WORKING JUST FINE SO FAR. CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS TOP NOTCH. I AM HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE AND ATTENTION TO CUSTOMER CONCERNS.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Built in inflate and deflate pump is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The materials are high quality and the built in pump comes with adequate cord length that has a storage slot built in to the mattress. Also, not only does the pump inflate, it has a DEFLATE. mode that conveniently sucks all the air out of the mattress in quick order allowing for easy folding and storage. I didn’t see this feature in the description. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Flynt (MS)

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Because of surgery, I could not use stairs for some weeks. Bought this air mattress to use in the inerim. Found it to be comfortable, with excellent support. Maintained the air pressure for a week before we had to add a little more air.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P. Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Easy to store. Great height and good for small spaces. Needed to be topped off with a little air after the first night but the directions warned about it (initial stretching of the rubber) so it wasn’t a surprise. After that it held air fine. Very comfortable and Flocked surface kept sheet from slipping. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This product started out good but within one month it was losing air in the seam, the company sent me another bed and it started doing the same thing. The tape provided is useless, I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LadyElle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my kids to sleep on when we had family visiting this summer. It inflated quickly, stayed inflated over several days, and my kids fought over who got to sleep on it they loved it so much. It works great as a spare bed for short term use.
customer_reviews.author: willie

customer_reviews.title: Great spare bed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate Great Spare Bed! Easy to store! This was the perfect spare bed for my niece when in town at the holidays and an extra bed to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: sarahjam

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 5 minutes to auto inflate. No smell. Very little air leakage. My teenage grandkids liked it. Easy to fold and put away. Especially for this price, a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: harvey silverberg md

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bed for company or camping
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Bought for extra bed and it worked perfect. Slight air loss after a few days easily reset to optimum.good value
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Girl Scout over night stays. Works great for me to have comfort while I sleep at overnight stays with our gs troop. Nice bag to carry it in and It’s that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Attar

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to sleep on and for lounging in front of TV. Easy to inflate and deflate and folds fairly well for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was exactly what we needed, easy to inflate, comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Put up in my husbands Radio room and used for company. Works good and easy to inflate or deflate if you add to much air.
customer_reviews.author: No name used in review.

customer_reviews.title: Has bad seams
customer_reviews.text: Had this product only 2 months and it has a seam coming apart so it will not stay inflated. Going to contact manufacturer and see what they can do. Will follow up with results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy air mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sin to sleep on while he was visiting. He said it was comfortable and wanted to know where I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!!
customer_reviews.text: The twin mattress was so comfortable camping. It was like sleeping in your own bed. We also put a 2" foam topper on it. The only thing you need to do is add air each night I think it's because of the altitude. Two of these fit into our 8x10 tent.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good inflatable mattress
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two and used for a week. They inflated easily, were comfortable and seem to be good quality. They come in a bag for portability. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fellingl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mattress as my temporary bed for over a month. I am 76 and I have slept perfectly fine. I will be using for guests and for camping. I am very pleased with being able to adjust the firmness when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from my neice & nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Just be sure you have a fitted sheet that is deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is easy to fit and transport in the bag provided. No concerns at this point. It is extremely easy to inflate and have noticed very little to no settling. It was used for a house guest all weekend and did not have to add air through the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Fuhrer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, inflate, & deflate. Comfort will take time to figure out as to just how much air to use, but overall a VERY good product.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and inflate and deflate. It’s fast and painless. Very comfortable and well made. I like it very much after having a different one for a while. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Aired up nicely nice and firm. not the corners. don't sit on corners!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Happy--hold the air
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this air bed for my grandson who was coming to visit. Last one I tried did not hold air. This one held the air for several days--taking it down now. Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The mattress started to leak immediately, had to use it, so I patched it
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love this air mattress so comfy I fall asleep in minutes instead of tossing and turning all night
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great airbed
customer_reviews.text: We used it for about a month while we were in the process of moving in place of a bed. I think added minimal air a couple times only during that time. Love the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Nigg

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Ease
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate, a little noisy but it is done in about 3 minutes. The height of the mattress makes it easy to use on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Very firm . Actually loud when filling,but fills fast. Use it for mattress as my air mattress leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Extra sleeping area
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but inflation was fast and easy and hope it will fold back to almost the size it was initially.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Boone

customer_reviews.title: Bed is child size
customer_reviews.text: They should advertise this as a child size bed. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good mattress, seems to lose a little air, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: It is stop working, how i could return it back.
customer_reviews.text: it is stop working, almost slept on a floor last night.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Brufman

customer_reviews.title: A great air bed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchases the twin size. I had a sleep number bed, but honestly, I get a better nights sleep on the air bed. It can be adjusted from soft to hard. I am very happy with the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cobban

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  High quality.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it for a few months, but it seems to be a quality airbed. It inflates and deflates quickly with the built in pump, which is electric, not battery operated. We found that it did lose a little air with the first use, but the seams have settled and it is holding air perfectly. It's a little more comfortable for my grandson if it's not fully inflated. It folds up easily and quickly for storage when not in use. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and holding up after a week use
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s a great comfy air mattress only had it for a week I’ll update if any issues arise. Easy to use and inflate needs a little air every few days but then that is expected after all it’s soft plastic. Much better than Intex brand which after several months of use there seems to be microscopic holes that are impossible to find and to the trash it goes. I’ll update on how it deflates and folds up.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have chemical sensitivity and was really concerned about getting a bed that did not have a chemical smell. This one smelled faintly of vinyl when I opened it, but I inflated it and aired it out outside for a couple of days, and now it has no smell. It’s comfortable and easy to inflate and deflate according to your comfort level. Glad I choose this one. Now I can sleep in the basement when it’s hot upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This Etekcity air mattress is comfortable, easy to inflate and deflate with the built in pump, and actually fits back into the storage bag without difficulty. It sits about 18" high and holds the air remarkably well. I used it on and off for a month and only found it necessary to add a little more air one time. I am in my sixties with a bad back and found it very comfortable. An air mattress done right.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Moso

customer_reviews.title: Inflates very quickly and provides a comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.text: At 18 inches high, this is a very comfortable air mattress It really is a breeze to inflate with the built in pump that both inflates and deflates really fast. It is sturdy and well-made and I recommend this mattress to anyone who needs a guest bed or camper who loves to be a little higher off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate, fold, and store. Slept on it several nights while sleep training one of my kids. Definitely need to reinflate it before going to sleep every night. I also recommend two sheets even maybe a blanket to lay on as it makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fsilva008

customer_reviews.title: What a great guest bed!
customer_reviews.text: We took it on vacation and it worked great. It inflates in about 2 minutes. Deflates in about the same time. Over a 5 day period, we added a little more air one day. I thinks its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how comfortable it is. The first 24 hours there was. a smell, which I expected, plastic has a smell. After airing it out for 2 days the smell went away. good quality. thank you
customer_reviews.author: HS Cooler

customer_reviews.title: inflated edges cause neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use for thanksgiving - my son used it 3 nights and complained daily - I got a flatter pillow, thinking that would help. I ordered too soon as it is now too late to return this inflatable bed and re select. Bed only good for short people who fit into the middle space.
customer_reviews.author: joanell k connolly

customer_reviews.title: comfortable nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: Quick set up pretty comfortable tends to loose a little air . The price was very reasonable. Thanks for a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could sit on the side to tie up shoes
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality. Had company, blew it up in 2 minutes like it said. The woman that slept on it said it was a good nights sleep. It has a place to blow it up manually to. Like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Chester J.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet.. but seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far we are using this to stage an extra bedroom for real estate. Haven't had anyone sleep on it but seems to be decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This powered unit makes inflating and deflating a simple task.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Fills up fast and deflates very easy and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got here in record time. Affordable and very fast to fill itself up. Easy to deflate. Bagging it in his bag is a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Company.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was great for our company. Or more company than we planned on.
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: Everything is easy about this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so easy to fold and very comfy for my kids to take to grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I got it at a good price! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CDPlayer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It’s been only a month since I bought it but my daughter slept on it for a week. And no complaint. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hulya Ozudogru

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product which inflates easily and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: sweinsss

customer_reviews.title: Great camping air mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, didn't eat up my tent space, and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amarilis Rivera

product_meta.title: Etekcity Air Mattress Upgraded Twin Size Inflatable Airbed Blow Up Air Bed Raised Mattress with Built-in Pump for Camping, Guest, Hiking, Height 18”, Storage Bag
feature_bullets: Powerful pump: Plug in the air mattress to let the built-in pump quickly inflate/deflate the bed for you. Full inflation only takes 3–5 minutes!
Wave-beam Technology: The mattress’ inner construction is built with the latest tech. Wave-beam, it’s more durable and stable than traditional air coil beams, max capacity is up to 550 lb
Quality Materials: 20% thicker PVC and flocked top than traditional air bed surfaces, this help the air mattress remain level and firm without sinking or leaking; Bed size, inflated: 75 x 39 x 18 in

Safe Materials: Materials pass official US CA Prop 65 tests on lead, cadmium, and phthalates, so the mattress is non-toxic and safe for the whole family. The multi-layer flocked top is puncture-resistant, waterproof

Easy Store & Set up: Avoid bulky or heavy bed setups! The 18-in height makes it easy to get on or climb off. Folded up, the mattress is easily stored or packed up in the included carry bag for travel. Conveniently store it in a closet or under a bed

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
